Articles.Content:
When i load my part into the game the textures are all faded. Is it because it has transparency?

Pictures:

In-Game Model

The UV Map when uploaded to Imgur

The UV Map\'s thumbnail

See how its faded?

Nvm, I see it now.

This is indeed akward. Personally I never use transparancy on my textures. So make it a full solid image. Give it a white background or one that suits the texture better. Also check out the alpha of the texture, maybe something is wrong there.
While I wouldn\'t keep the transparency (no need for it) I think you just have a wonky save; I resaved it and uploaded it and it looks fine in the browser now, try this one.
